message.content: I found the issue! There are two functions with the same name `update_feed`. I need to rename my PUT endpoint function to avoid the conflict.

content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   945	        logger.error(f"Error during /api/feeds/update-all: {str(e)}", exc_info=True)
   946	        # Consistent error response with other parts of the API
   947	        return jsonify({'error': 'An error occurred while updating all feeds.'}), 500
   948	
   949	@app.route('/api/feeds/<int:feed_id>/update', methods=['POST'])
   950	def update_feed(feed_id):
   951	    """Manually triggers an update check for a specific feed."""
   952	    feed = db.get_or_404(Feed, feed_id)
   953	    try:
   954	        success, new_items = fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
   955	        if success and new_items > 0:
   956	            invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
   957	            logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after manual update of feed {feed.id}.")
   958	        
   959	        return jsonify(feed.to_dict())
   960	    except Exception as e:
   961	        logger.error(f"Error during manual update for feed {feed.id}: {e}", exc_info=True)
   962	        return jsonify({'error': f'Failed to update feed {feed.id}. An unexpected error occurred.'}), 500
   963	
   964	# --- Application Initialization and Startup ---
   965
